title: Kansas City Royals average ticket price 2006 to 2019
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, containing a total of 13 data points.
Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2006 to 2007, slightly increasing from 2007 to 2008, roughly constant from 2008 to 2011, rapidly increasing from 2011 to 2018, and lastly roughly constant from 2018 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2018.
The highest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 33.58 was reached at Year 2018
The lowest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 13.71 was reported at Year 2006
